comment: * Contains utility methods for chunk serialization and deserialization.

methods.name: public static String getString(ByteBuffer buf, int len)
methods.comment:
* Utility function to copy a String out of a ByteBuffer.
     *
     * This is here because multiple chunk handlers can make use of it,
     * and there's nowhere better to put it.

methods.name: public static void putString(ByteBuffer buf, String str)
methods.comment: * Utility function to copy a String into a ByteBuffer.

methodNames: public static String getString(ByteBuffer buf, int len)
public static void putString(ByteBuffer buf, String str)
